author: jsdelfino
msg: Fix for TUSCANY-1731. Excluded xerces from axiom-api dependencies, and replaced by a dependency on xerces 2.8.1. Added a dependency on xml-api 1.3.03 instead to have this level instead of 1.0.b2. This fixes NoSuchMethodError and VerifyError exceptions when running on WebSphere.

author: woonsan
msg: Implemented edit_defaults and about custom portlet modes.
Only admin users can use edit_defaults mode, and the default preferences are stored in PSML pages.
To enable this feature, the portlet decoration properties should have 'actions.factory=CustomDecoratorActionsAdapter'. See /decorations/portlet/tigris/decorator.properties.
Implemented edit_defaults and about custom portlet modes for the PickANumber portlet.
